de.larssh.utils

Class Optionals

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.larssh.utils.Optionals

  • public final class Optionals
extends Object
    This class contains helper methods for Optional.

    • Method Detail

      • comparator

        public static <T extends Comparable<T>> Comparator<? super Optional<? extends T>> comparator()
        Creates a Comparator to compare Optionals based on the inner types Comparable implementation.
        Type Parameters:
        T - optional value type
        Returns:
        comparator for optional

      • comparator

        public static <T> Comparator<? super Optional<? extends T>> comparator(Comparator<? super T> comparator)
        Wraps a Comparator to allow compare Optionals.

        When comparing comparator is called with the optionals object if present or null. Therefore it needs to handle null values appropriately. Use Comparator.nullsFirst(Comparator) and Comparator.nullsLast(Comparator) if your comparator does not.

        Type Parameters:
        T - optional value type
        Parameters:
        comparator - optional value comparator
        Returns:
        comparator for optional

      • flatMapToDouble

        public static <T> OptionalDouble flatMapToDouble(Optional<T> optional,
                                                 Function<? super T,OptionalDouble> mapper)
        If a value is present, apply the provided OptionalDouble-bearing mapping function to it, return that result, otherwise return an empty OptionalDouble. This method is similar to mapToDouble(Optional, ToDoubleFunction), but the provided mapper is one whose result is already an OptionalDouble, and if invoked, flatMapToDouble does not wrap it with an additional OptionalDouble.
        Type Parameters:
        T - element type
        Parameters:
        optional - optional value
        mapper - a mapping function to apply to the value, if present the mapping function
        Returns:
        the result of applying an OptionalDouble-bearing mapping function to the value of this OptionalDouble, if a value is present, otherwise an empty OptionalDouble

      • flatMapToInt

        public static <T> OptionalInt flatMapToInt(Optional<T> optional,
                                           Function<? super T,OptionalInt> mapper)
        If a value is present, apply the provided OptionalInt-bearing mapping function to it, return that result, otherwise return an empty OptionalInt. This method is similar to mapToInt(Optional, ToIntFunction), but the provided mapper is one whose result is already an OptionalInt, and if invoked, flatMap does not wrap it with an additional OptionalInt.
        Type Parameters:
        T - element type
        Parameters:
        optional - optional value
        mapper - a mapping function to apply to the value, if present the mapping function
        Returns:
        the result of applying an OptionalInt-bearing mapping function to the value of this OptionalInt, if a value is present, otherwise an empty OptionalInt

      • flatMapToLong

        public static <T> OptionalLong flatMapToLong(Optional<T> optional,
                                             Function<? super T,OptionalLong> mapper)
        If a value is present, apply the provided OptionalLong-bearing mapping function to it, return that result, otherwise return an empty OptionalLong. This method is similar to mapToLong(Optional, ToLongFunction), but the provided mapper is one whose result is already an OptionalLong, and if invoked, flatMapToDouble does not wrap it with an additional OptionalLong.
        Type Parameters:
        T - element type
        Parameters:
        optional - optional value
        mapper - a mapping function to apply to the value, if present the mapping function
        Returns:
        the result of applying an OptionalLong-bearing mapping function to the value of this OptionalLong, if a value is present, otherwise an empty OptionalLong

      • getFirst

        @SafeVarargs
public static <T> Optional<T> getFirst(Optional<T>... values)
        Returns the first present value. Returns empty if no value is present.
        Type Parameters:
        T - value type
        Parameters:
        values - any number of optional values to test
        Returns:
        the first present value, empty if no value is present

      • getFirst

        @SafeVarargs
public static <T> Optional<T> getFirst(Supplier<? extends Optional<T>>... suppliers)
        Returns the first present value. Values are created on-demand by calling suppliers one after the other. Returns empty if no value is present.
        Type Parameters:
        T - value type
        Parameters:
        suppliers - any number of value suppliers, which values to test, evaluated in a lazy manner
        Returns:
        the first present value, empty if no value is present

      • getFirst

        @SafeVarargs
public static <T> Optional<T> getFirst(Predicate<? super T> isPresent,
                                                    Supplier<? extends T>... suppliers)
        Returns an Optional describing the first value matching the predicate isPresent. Values are created on-demand by calling suppliers one after the other. Returns an empty Optional if no element matches.
        Type Parameters:
        T - type of the return value
        Parameters:
        isPresent - predicate to match
        suppliers - any number of value suppliers, which values to test, evaluated in a lazy manner
        Returns:
        an Optional describing the first value matching the predicate isPresent, an empty Optional if no element matches

      • getFirstValue

        @SafeVarargs
public static <T> Optional<T> getFirstValue(Predicate<? super T> isPresent,
                                                         T... values)
        Returns an Optional describing the first value matching the predicate isPresent. Returns an empty Optional if no element matches.
        Type Parameters:
        T - type of the return value
        Parameters:
        isPresent - predicate to match
        values - any number of values to test
        Returns:
        an Optional describing the first value matching the predicate isPresent, an empty Optional if no element matches

      • mapToDouble

        public static OptionalDouble mapToDouble(Optional<Double> optional)
        If a value is present, returns an OptionalDouble describing the result. Otherwise returns an empty OptionalDouble.
        Parameters:
        optional - optional value
        Returns:
        an OptionalDouble describing the value of optional, if a value is present, otherwise an empty OptionalDouble

      • mapToDouble

        public static <T> OptionalDouble mapToDouble(Optional<T> optional,
                                             ToDoubleFunction<? super T> mapper)
        If a value is present, applies mapper to optional and returns an OptionalDouble describing the result. Otherwise returns an empty OptionalDouble.
        Type Parameters:
        T - element type
        Parameters:
        optional - optional value
        mapper - a mapping function to apply to the value, if present
        Returns:
        an OptionalDouble describing the result of applying mapper function to the value of optional, if a value is present, otherwise an empty OptionalDouble

      • ofNon

        public static <T> Optional<T> ofNon(Predicate<? super T> isEmpty,
                                    @Nullable
                                    T value)
        Returns an Optional describing the specified value, if non-null and non-empty, otherwise returns an empty Optional. The term empty is described by isEmpty.
        Type Parameters:
        T - value type
        Parameters:
        isEmpty - predicate describing the term empty
        value - the possibly-null-or-empty value to describe
        Returns:
        an Optional with a present value if the specified value is non-null and non-empty, otherwise an empty Optional

      • ofNonBlank

        public static Optional<String> ofNonBlank(@Nullable
                                          String string)
        Returns an Optional describing the specified string, if non-null and non-blank, otherwise returns an empty Optional.
        Parameters:
        string - the possibly-null-or-blank string to describe
        Returns:
        an Optional with a present value if the specified string is non-null and non-empty after being trimmed, otherwise an empty Optional

      • ofSingle

        public static <T> Optional<T> ofSingle(T[] array)
        Returns an Optional describing the specified arrays first element, if present, otherwise returns an empty Optional. Throws a TooManyElementsException if array contains more than one element.
        Type Parameters:
        T - array element type
        Parameters:
        array - the array describing the element
        Returns:
        an Optional describing the specified arrays first element, if present, otherwise returns an empty Optional
        Throws:
        TooManyElementsException - if array contains more than one element

      • ofSingle

        public static <T> Optional<T> ofSingle(Iterable<T> iterable)
        Returns an Optional describing the specified iterables first element, if present, otherwise returns an empty Optional. Throws a TooManyElementsException if iterable contains more than one element.
        Type Parameters:
        T - iterable element type
        Parameters:
        iterable - the iterable describing the element
        Returns:
        an Optional describing the specified iterables first element, if present, otherwise returns an empty Optional
        Throws:
        TooManyElementsException - if iterable contains more than one element

      • ofSingle

        public static <T> Optional<T> ofSingle(Iterator<T> iterator)
        Returns an Optional describing the specified iterators first element, if present, otherwise returns an empty Optional. Throws a TooManyElementsException if iterator contains more than one element.
        Type Parameters:
        T - iterator element type
        Parameters:
        iterator - the iterator describing the element
        Returns:
        an Optional describing the specified iterators first element, if present, otherwise returns an empty Optional
        Throws:
        TooManyElementsException - if iterator contains more than one element

      • ofSingle

        public static <T> Optional<T> ofSingle(Stream<T> stream)
        Returns an Optional describing the specified streams first element, if present, otherwise returns an empty Optional. Throws a TooManyElementsException if stream contains more than one element.

        This is a terminal operation.

        Type Parameters:
        T - stream element type
        Parameters:
        stream - the stream describing the element
        Returns:
        an Optional describing the specified streams first element, if present, otherwise returns an empty Optional
        Throws:
        TooManyElementsException - if stream contains more than one element

      • ofSingle

        public static OptionalInt ofSingle(CharSequence string)
        Returns an OptionalInt describing the specified strings first character, if present, otherwise returns an empty OptionalInt. Throws a TooManyElementsException if string contains more than one character, ignoring trailing whitespaces.

        Whitespace characters are recognized using Characters.isAsciiWhitespace(char).

        Parameters:
        string - the string describing the character
        Returns:
        an OptionalInt describing the specified strings first character, if present, otherwise returns an empty OptionalInt
        Throws:
        TooManyElementsException - if string contains more than one character, ignoring trailing whitespaces

      • stream

        @SafeVarargs
public static <T> Stream<T> stream(Optional<T>... optionals)
        Returns a stream consisting of present elements.
        Type Parameters:
        T - element type
        Parameters:
        optionals - array of optional elements
        Returns:
        the new stream
